name: SPACE - Super Play A Coursera Example
name_original: SPACE - Super Play A Coursera Example
description:
Welcome to my project for my  Coursera 3D Platformer!

By Roy A Mullis with assets added from MSU and music by Joel Stuedler.

Key additions are:

  • Changes to Level 1 layout
  • New Level 2
  • New Level 3 (REALLY high climb!)
  • Added up and down sliding door w/ custom script
  • Added thrusters w/ emitters under platforms
  • Updated About Page
  • Created Instruction Page
  • Licensed some music and put in each level
  • Little fixes here and there
